response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this item for $1,200,000. This exceptional piece represents a significant investment that could potentially yield substantial returns based on its rarity and quality. I believe it aligns well with your interests and aspirations, and I am confident it will serve you exceptionally well. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or arrange a viewing.", "product_price": 1200000}
